creator: Kristian.Bergmann@nvg.org
text:
Graceful restart via the commad-line, ie. bin/apache.exe -n "service_name" -k 
restart, is ignored. It's almost as if it's unable to link with the service 
properly. It works fine if done through the monitor-application in the tray.

creator: Kristian.Bergmann@nvg.org

text:
I sumited a patch that fixes this problem on the service.c file.

http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/httpd-2.0/server/mpm/winnt/service.c



*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 12011 ***
creator: juan.rivera@citrix.com
